column143: The Bidder with 3rd higher average annual turnover among the bidder may be considered as L3 Bidder
All the lowest bid are equal so that the bidder is considered as per the Average Annual Turnover
The Bidder with 2nd higher average annual turnover among the bidder may be considered as L2 Bidder
The Bidder with 4th higher average annual turnover among the bidder may be considered as L4 Bidder
